import React,{useState} from 'react'; import {useHistory} from "react-router-dom" import * as mdb from 'mdb-ui-kit'; import './signin.css'; function Sign(){ let history = useHistory() const [Login, setLogin] = useState ({ name: " ", email: " ", password: " " }) const setting = (e) =>{ setLogin( { ...Login, [e.target.name]: e.target.value } ) } function signin(e){ e.preventDefault(); const {name, email, password} = Login console.log(Login) console.log("ok so, after the click we get this") const sendmethod = { method: "GET", headers:{ 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json' } } fetch("http://localhost:5000/test", sendmethod) .then( (res) => res.json() ) .then( (log) => console.log( log.non )) } return
Sign in
Name
Surname
Email
Password
} export default Sign;
